CustomField.description: Determines how the Payment record will be created and corresponding validation rules from regular GP. Value to be stored on the Payment Amount field of the Payment record will either be Gift Amount only or Gift Amount + Non-Gift Amount.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines how the Payment record will be created and corresponding validation rules from regular GP. Value to be stored on the Payment Amount field of the Payment record will either be Gift Amount only or Gift Amount + Non-Gift Amount.
CustomField.label: Payment Method
